tiles.name: neo_mumbai_skycity_sector_alpha
tiles.description: Gleaming towers reserved for the Conglomerate elite, accessible only by authorized sky-lifts and patrolled by drone security.

tiles.name: central_data_hub
tiles.description: The core of the Omni-Net, a massive server farm constantly monitoring activity across Neo-Mumbai. Access is heavily restricted.

tiles.name: conglomerate_manufacturing_district
tiles.description: Automated factories churning out consumer goods for the Sky-Cities, powered by questionable energy sources. Heavy pollution is common.

tiles.name: upper_level_residential_zone
tiles.description: High-density housing for privileged workers who support the Conglomerate infrastructure. A stark contrast to the Underlevels.

tiles.name: aerial_transport_hub
tiles.description: A network of platforms and docking stations for transport drones, ferrying goods and personnel between districts.

tiles.name: waste_recycling_plant_epsilon
tiles.description: A sprawling complex processing waste from the Sky-Cities. Unpleasant fumes often drift down into the lower levels.

tiles.name: sector_beta_commercial_district
tiles.description: A hub of legal trade in Neo-Mumbai, heavily monitored by Conglomerate security forces. High-end goods are sold here.

tiles.name: artificial_sunlight_generator_site
tiles.description: A series of powerful lamps projecting limited sunlight into the Underlevels. Maintained and controlled by the Conglomerates.

tiles.name: neo_mumbai_central_power_grid
tiles.description: A colossal energy plant powering the entire city. Vulnerable to sabotage and critical to the Conglomerate's control.

tiles.name: overground_train_line_1_terminus
tiles.description: A major transit hub connecting various city sectors, often overcrowded and heavily guarded.

tiles.name: sector_gamma_7_entrance_zone
tiles.description: The main entry point to the Underlevels, a crowded and chaotic area filled with checkpoints and black market stalls.

tiles.name: dilapidated_housing_block_42
tiles.description: A decaying apartment complex in Sector Gamma-7, home to many struggling families like the Rishis.

tiles.name: gamma_7_black_market_square
tiles.description: A bustling hub for illegal goods and services, from scavenged technology to bootleg nutrient paste.

tiles.name: abandoned_subway_station_delta
tiles.description: A crumbling relic of the pre-Collapse era, now used as a hideout by resistance cells and scavengers.

tiles.name: underlevel_waste_processing_chute_7
tiles.description: A hazardous area where raw sewage and industrial waste are dumped, emitting noxious fumes.

tiles.name: makeshift_repair_shop_alley
tiles.description: A cluster of small workshops where skilled individuals repair broken machinery and electronics, using salvaged parts.

tiles.name: underground_hydroponics_farm
tiles.description: A hidden farm growing meager crops under artificial light, providing a small amount of fresh food to the Underlevels.

tiles.name: resistance_cell_meeting_point_alpha
tiles.description: A secret location used by rebels plotting against the Conglomerates, heavily guarded and constantly changing.

tiles.name: collapsed_highway_overpass_zone
tiles.description: A crumbling reminder of the Great Collapse, blocking access to certain areas and providing cover for outlaws.

tiles.name: forgotten_tech_salvage_site_omega
tiles.description: A dangerous area where scavengers search for valuable technology buried beneath the rubble.

tiles.name: industrial_outskirts_sector_theta
tiles.description: Factories that make parts for the high cities. Pollution is rampant and very few regulations exist.

tiles.name: smog_covered_wasteland
tiles.description: Barren area where toxic chemicals have leaked. Inhabitable by many forms of life.

tiles.name: pre_collapse_highway_fragment
tiles.description: A ruined section of ancient road. Now used by scavengers and raiders for easy access to the city's outskirts.

tiles.name: abandoned_mining_quarry
tiles.description: A deep chasm left when the mining was closed. This area is largely uninhabited.

tiles.name: nutrient_paste_refinery
tiles.description: Industrial plant that provides the food for the masses. Controlled by the Conglomerates.

tiles.name: the_great_divider_river
tiles.description: River that splits the land. Used by smugglers and raiders to transport goods. Very little is known about this area.

tiles.name: shanty_town_outside_sector
tiles.description: Shacks are built on top of each other to provide housing for the low class.

tiles.name: the_forgotten_woods
tiles.description: The forests are largely uninhabited by humans due to radioactive leaks. Wildlife is rare.

tiles.name: conglomerate_security_outpost_gamma
tiles.description: Heavily fortified outpost. They guard the river crossings.

tiles.name: old_monument_park
tiles.description: Ancient statues and monuments from a time before the collapse.

tiles.name: artificial_lake_alpha
tiles.description: artificialy created lake to provide water to the area.

tiles.name: suburban_sector_kappa
tiles.description: Upper-lower class lives here. Safe neighborhood controlled by a private company.

tiles.name: high_speed_rail_track
tiles.description: Very fast rail to connect parts of the city.

tiles.name: commercial_hub_delta
tiles.description: District full of stores and shops.

tiles.name: the_pre_collapse_plaza
tiles.description: a huge plaza from before the collapse.

tiles.name: the_cybernetic_modification_center
tiles.description: cyborg technology can be upgraded here.

tiles.name: the_industrial_port
tiles.description: Area where items are shipped in and out.

tiles.name: the_artificial_fishery
tiles.description: fish is produced here using cybernetic enhancements.

tiles.name: the_waste_disposal_barges
tiles.description: barges dispose of waste by taking it to the ocean.

tiles.name: coastal_defense_zone
tiles.description: military base that defends the coast.

tiles.name: ancient_ruined_city
tiles.description: old buildings lost to the sea.

tiles.name: the_virtual_reality_parlor
tiles.description: VR experience for the upper class.
